title: navaraathrOthsava
sahitya:
navarAtrOtsava vaibhavE nAmanubhavasitE bhAgyavu



anupallavi



 bhuvanEshvari purANi purahari nityakalyANi



caraNam

 sarva shakti cAmuNDEshvari sarva bhAgyadAyini gauri parvatEndra

 sukumAri  bhaktajanA akhahAri garva rahita jaya nAlvaDi krSNarAjEndra

 hrdaya kamalavAsa harikEsha kAmini poreyaLa manOnmaNi
